Blog.post: well today? Nothing special happened [yet]..well its still early..i guess? hehe.. Just kinda depressed..cus HE didnt call mee..HE didnt go online..Which he said he will? Yesterday he said he'll wait for mee after my activity is finished..but he did NOT..dunnow where he went..And then i asked wing yan to call him..hes father said hes takin a bath..well obviously he just came home.. dayumn.. dont know whats wrong with him..well..dont know? **Maybe** he might call me later..okai..well im currently so bored..so theres exactly nothing to blog about..im just waiting for him to go online and goin to ask him whuts wrong with him..well..i might go to jordan? Watch my sister perform..Yehh.. pakk shyet..tomorrow is monday..which means dats d beginning of the week..dat is so not right..cus i'll have to go to school.. as usual.. cant wait till summer vacation comes..!! gana hibernate thoroughout the whole year [how i wish]..hehe..well i guess dats all for today's afternooon..i might continue the rest of the day later on..soo..im outs bhaybhi3 bounc3 bounc3 bounc3!! hehe..tayke kare n God bweSs! mwuah! -=Genelarie#05=- 8:49 pm - currently eating crackers [FOR DINNER] well hellow..im bakk agen!! The Day Continues..lol..okei..well i didnt go jordan..i was suppose to..[referring to my above's blog]..ohh wells..my fudder went..Lanie said she was goin with mai mudder..but they didnt go as well..8:30 daw eh? okai..chorrie nalang RHUBEE! nyehehe! okok..im now Home Alone thats why im eating crackers for dinner..*sniff sniff*..poor mEe!..ow wells..i dont mind..im enjoying my time here..no disturbance or anything..hehe..well no labs to talk too..dats d sad thing.. **naks labs..ur studying eyy?*..pakk shyet!! America's Next Top model is showing..!! well..ayah..i might blog agen later..hehe..i wanna WATCH ehh!! hehe..chigee people im outs bhaybhie bounc3 bounc3 boucn3 Fher awhile..*dont Panic..i'll be back!!* hehe..okei tayke caRe n God blEss..!! MwuAaHz! -=Genelarie=- 9:21 am - currentleh listening to *Shake ya body-Tyra Banks* Okei..I am bakk!! *whutever*..okei..ermm..i enjoyed watching..there nothing else to do now..im just blogging..imm bored agenn..!! *OoH noOo!*..nyehehe!! i am totally speechless right now..Ruby,Aids and muh fudder just came h0me..and today's not my day to use d computer..so i really have to go..Acceptable Reason..well..okei..im outs naah! tayke kare n god bwess eVery0ne! mWwuAaH! Muh bhaybhie:Lab..Y cant u call meee? mee miss u soo muchh..well i'll just see u tomorrow iights? tCCiC..!! ermm..yehh i guess dats it..miss u s0o0o much! mwuahhziEes! I l0Ve yh0w sA0 muCh! buhbusHi3! Always N ForeBer =Genelarie25=

Today i think i had a great time..we went Ocean Park with 1A1..but then 1A2 n 2A2 came abit later..dats y they cud stay a little longer..o wellz..1st we went to this Panda's Habitat..lol..well d female one called Jia Jia..n d male one called An An..i forgot..dont laugh if i made it d opposite..lol..okok..ermm..then took pictures of them..cus they were so adorable!..Lanie also took..wingz wanted to..but she cudnt becus she forgot to bring a camera..well..sad thang fer her..after d panda shyet..we went to d this..ermm..forgot d name..basta..have to pay 10 dollars fer each person..its worth it though..its so KoOoL..i thought i was going to regret..but then..hehe..after that..we went to d headland..woah! ehehe..lanie n wings 1st played The Crazy Gallion? i didnt go..cus i wanted someone to go with me..whos scared too! then wings n lanie played The Dragon..didnt tag along..cus..styll waiting..then just chatted with a friend of mine for a while..just waiting for wings n lanie..then yun..after that..we went to d Flying swing..it wus Crap..well i tried it b4..so it wasnt dat freaky..then i SAW JANE!! nyahah!! then told her to come n ride The Dragon with me..and she did! yay! it was sooo kooL..then..i rode The Crazy Gallion..Jay,wingyan and Lanie were sitting at d back of us..we were sitting on d second last row..!! shyet..!! johnathan..yves and paul were at d opposite side..well sorrie if i miss anyone..cus dats d only people who i saw..it wus saoo Freaky..[1st time] so dont criticize..lol..after that i wanted to try The Dragon Again..but then d party pooper Ms lau stopped me n jane..btw..lanie n wings went to play The Abysss..!! Pak shyEt! wen will i ever try? hehe..then we went to d other side n play swing swing..we had no choice..lol..hehe..then after that..wings sed we have to go bak to d main entrance nahh..im like NOWAY! ...so told them to Take The Eagle With me..since its just right in front of us..lol..wings was like screaming so much..lol..weird..shes not even scared of the abyss..how come shes scared of The EAgle..hmm..something's strange..haha..lol..okokok..then..after The Eagle..we took pictures on d way..we wanted to take the Mine Train..but then..it was late na..but i wanted to take raging river..so four ov us took..then fiakkk!! lol..so freakie..lanie's in front..im second..third wingyan..last Jane..hehe..i was like smiling for d camera..but then..it turned out to be hidden..lanie's hair eh..but even if i was shown..i think i'll look weird..soo thank u nalang Lanie! hehe..cute Jane..she was hiding..lol..actually me n jane we hidden..lol..Lanies fingers was Posing..nakanang..lol..then we saw our pic..we were like laughing..then yun..took d escalator to meet ms lau n d classes..but then we had to wait for Pramila..she was goin with 1A2 ghurls..then...we were like we should have took d Mine Train..same thing..pak shyet..ayahh..i had FuNnNNn!! then After dat..we took the coach to go bak to school...then me,wings and lanie..went Diamond Hill..Game Centre..played this Driving thingy..i won wings n lanie..! im d pro! haha..jokejoke..then went mcdonalds..sat for 5-10 minutes..then go home..!! me n wings took bus no.89..lanie took bus no 11...then here i am..blogging..hehe..chigee chigee..dats muh day for today..!! hehe..chigee i outs bhaybhi3 bounce bounce bounce!!..tayke kaRe n God bweSs! mwuahhzz..-=Genelarie05=-

okei..hello! well fucking computer's fucked up..aRgHh..i have to type this shyet all over agen! okei whut happened? ermm..yesterday i slept at 4 something..cuss..i wasnt sleepy at all..maybe becus d coffee i drank..lol..played inklink fher a long time.guess im already an expert! mwuahah! i'll show u some ov meeh high scOre later..well i'll have to find d code fher putting d pictuRe thing..and..eRmm..h0pe it'll work..and i miss labs..he didnt go online and he didnt call me too! but i understand..so im not mad..his father ehh..*right labs?*..lol..ermm..okei..i'll ask labs to fix meeh site.if ever he cud go online..i dunt know eh..i tried fixing d scrollbar..n i found d code..but i dunnow where to paste d code..theres like so mani parts..haii! my dads making me eat..lol..i dont think my diet plans will work out..cus if im stuck in d house..all i'll think of is FOoD..!! lol..so i hab to go out sometime..but theres no place to go naman!..haii im extremely bored right naO..im about to die of boredom! lol..i'll watch nalang laTer..d movie called *mean girls*? hehe..i watched ShrEk 2..im so in lub with *puss in boots*..lol.sao adorable eyes! lol...anyways..im kinda speechless right now..i typed alot crAp in d 1st blog...but then this fucking computer was fucked up! not muh pr0blem..lol..soo..hmm..i'll play inklink nalang 1st..n gets some high scoRes n show oFF!! MWUAAHAHA! ..joke joke!..i just wanna play! hehe..chigee mee outs! tccic! iymma leave sum shouts fher me bhaybhie..!! AftEr scHOol? hehe..chiGee nahh..mee ghana play inklink! n i hab nothing else say..all i cud say is..i l0ve n miSs yhoW sao muCh! tayke Kare n God blEss! mWuAaAaHH!! -alWays N fOrebEr:GenElarie#05- urlLink clik tuh vi3w muH sc0r3!

Hey..im bak agen..ermm..i cud say today is a boring day..well..[as usual]..so theres nothing much dat i cud type about. I woke up around 11:45 this morning..than..do stuffs dat i usually dooH..than i watched T.V fher about 20-30 minutes..than i switched on d computer..than played inklink fher awhile..and fixed muh blogger template..i totally have no idea how to put HTMLs in blogger..!! i tried searching fher informations but nothing helped.. but its okei..i dont mind..nyahaha! okok..ermm..im currently chatting with jay..just talking about..**HER**..i miss lhabss..he didnt call me..= (..or go online..its okei..cus he gave me alot of lovings yesterday night..sweet nohh? hehe..but of corz meeh still miss him..haii..cant wait till monday..cus i'll bee hugging/kissing him so much..but i dont wanna go to schOol..cuss of those crappy lessons..i think im gana fail..this coming term exam..cus..im not really dat attentive anymore..dayum..and my mom's expecting me to be d 7th this term..dayum..i dont think i'll make it..okei...enough of d exams..anyways there's nothing i cud talk about..all i cud say is i miss himm..hehe! ermm..ohh yehh..im HOME alone AGAIN! mom n sis went to muh aunties's house..dont know where's muh fudder!..pr0bably with some unknown uncles..im so bored..what exactly i cud do? Eat? nahh..im eating do much this days..didnt even check muh weight! ohh noo! maybe i gain alot or something..but anyways..nevermind..imm gana go on a diet sooner or later! there's nothing to worry about..well i guess im done with muh blog..cus as i sed today is a boring day..what else can i type about? RIGHT?so im out! tayke caRe whoever u are! nakkss! mWuAah!! Bhaybhie:Labss? i understand why u cant call me or go online..me just wanna say me miss u soo muchh! i miss talking u to on d phonE!**sighh**.. have to wait till exams are over? and u cant go with me after school..u have to go straight home..= (..but okei lang...i'll wait..hehe..i guess dats it..chigee nahh..me goo bye bye naah! MwuAaaH!ay labb u soo muCh! TaykE cAre N gOd bwEsH! -alwayz n foReVeR..Genelarie#05-

eylow..meeh back! lol..okei..ermm..today..lets start with d morning part..normal..took bus no.89..went tah sChOol..but then wen i was at d main entrance..got caught by d fukkin prefecT..cus of muhh top..well..scReW Them..Fuckin Nerds(prefects)..no offense..haha..!! okei..then we had morning assembly..thenn..went back to class..1st CL lesson..we had to do this powerpoint assessment..den 2nd CL lesson we had this revision thingy..thenn..yunn..ermm..lunch..ate with muh bhaybhi3 as usual..then dats it..well..ermm..Me n Wings fought haha! ofn she slapped my face..well ov corz i had to do bak muh revenge..then she started doing harder n harder..well thenn bla bla..i scratched her face! haha! then she was mad and shyets..she was like using her towel..covering her face..thenn..nothing..she cried..**Lanie sed**..well didnt give a fuckk!..i was fukkin pissed at her..thenn..good fher her..okei..ermm..im soo bored..nothing tah do now..ohh yehh..After school me n Lhabs..went to Shatin..saw that WIng Yan..IGNORED her! haha..cute bhaybhie..so innocent..he doesnt know what's happening..lol..ayah..okei..ermm..dats it!..ate in Yoshinoya with muh bhaybhie boi..then we left at like 8 something..me worried..his fudder will blab..or ayy..= (..i guess dats it..i'll try tah blog agen laTers..okok..buhbush ! Lhabs: bhaybhie..hope ur father wont shout at u..or..get angry at yhow..i swear iymm gana miss u..Saturday n Sunday ehh..Cant talk tah yhow..well..obviously ur fudder wont let u use d phone or d pc..hehe..well hope u'll at least ring meeh! i had a great time with u today bhaybhie..thank yhow! i love you so much**stay unchanged forever**..hehe..motto ko yan! hehe..chiggeh..mehh go bye bye now! just want u to know me love u soo muCh! i love u more than i love myself! hehe..**true naman eh**...hehe..chigee mee go nahh...buhbush..MWUAHH!!..tayke kare n god blesh! ^.^
